price: İman edenler ve sâlih amel işleyenler ise, onlar için, kalacak Firdevs cennetleri vardır.
arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ كَانَتۡ لَهُمۡ جَنَّٰتُ ٱلۡفِرۡدَوۡسِ نُزُلًا

version.title: Turkish Translation - Ali Ozek
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by a group of scholars. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: inna alladhīna āmanū waʿamilū al-ṣāliḥāti kānat lahum jannātu al-fir'dawsi nuzulan
